languages.text: "Я встретил{mf||а} в Увечном секторе тварь, которая умеет красть годы и калечить тела. Ты способен это исцелить?"
"I met a monster in the Mangled Sector, a creature that can steal years of its victims' lives and mutilate their bodies. Are you able to heal that?"
languages.original_text: "Я встретил{mf||а} в Увечном секторе тварь, которая умеет красть годы и калечить тела. Ты способен это исцелить?"

traits.locale_text: "I met a monster in the Mangled Sector, a creature that can mutilate bodies. Are you able to heal that?"
"I met a monster in the Mangled Sector, a creature that can mutilate bodies. Are you able to heal that?"
"I met a monster in the Mangled Sector, a creature that can steal years of its victims' lives and mutilate their bodies. Are you able to heal that?"
"I met a monster in the Mangled Sector, a creature that can steal years of its victims' lives and mutilate their bodies. Are you able to heal that?"
"I met a monster in the Mangled Sector, a creature that can steal years of its victims' lives and mutilate their bodies. Are you able to heal that?"
"I met a monster in the Mangled Sector, a creature that can steal years of its victims' lives and mutilate their bodies. Are you able to heal that?"

languages.text: « J'ai croisé un monstre dans le Secteur condamné, une créature capable de raccourcir la vie de ses victimes de plusieurs années et de mutiler leurs corps. Seriez-vous capable de soigner ceci ? »
languages.original_text: "I met a monster in the Mangled Sector, a creature that can steal years of its victims' lives and mutilate their bodies. Are you able to heal that?"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai croisé un monstre dans le Secteur condamné, une créature capable de raccourcir la vie de ses victimes de plusieurs années et de mutiler leurs corps. Seriez-vous capable de soigner ceci ? »

languages.text: “我在崩落区那边遇到了一只怪物，它的攻击会窃取猎物的寿命，让肉体衰亡。你能治疗这样的伤口吗？”
languages.original_text: "I met a monster in the Mangled Sector, a creature that can steal years of its victims' lives and mutilate their bodies. Are you able to heal that?"

traits.locale_text: “我在崩落区那边遇到了一只怪物，它的攻击会让肉体衰亡。你能治疗这样的伤口吗？”

languages.text: "Ich bin im Zerfleischten Sektor einem Monster begegnet, einer Kreatur, die dem Leben ihrer Opfer Jahre stehlen und ihre Körper verstümmeln kann. Könnt Ihr das heilen?"
languages.original_text: "I met a monster in the Mangled Sector, a creature that can steal years of its victims' lives and mutilate their bodies. Are you able to heal that?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin im Zerfleischten Sektor einem Monster begegnet, einer Kreatur, die Körper verstümmeln kann. Könnt Ihr das heilen?"

languages.text: «He conocido a un monstruo en el Sector Destrozado, una criatura experta en mutilar cuerpos y en robar años de vida a sus víctimas. ¿Podrías curarlo?».
languages.original_text: "I met a monster in the Mangled Sector, a creature that can steal years of its victims' lives and mutilate their bodies. Are you able to heal that?"

traits.locale_text: «He conocido a un monstruo en el Sector Destrozado que es experto en mutilar cuerpos. ¿Podrías curarlo?».

languages.text: 「切り裂かれた星域で、犠牲者の身体を切り刻み、何年もの間活動できなくする生物と出会ったのだが、治療することはできるか？」
languages.original_text: "I met a monster in the Mangled Sector, a creature that can steal years of its victims' lives and mutilate their bodies. Are you able to heal that?"

traits.locale_text: 「切り裂かれた星域で、犠牲者の身体を切り刻み、何年もの間活動できなくする生物と出会ったのだが、治療することはできるか？」

languages.text: "Biçimsiz Sektör'de bir yaratıkla karşılaştım. Kurbanlarının yaşamlarından yıllar çalıp bedenlerini mutasyona uğratabiliyordu. Böyle bir şeyi iyileştirebilir misin?"
languages.original_text: "I met a monster in the Mangled Sector, a creature that can steal years of its victims' lives and mutilate their bodies. Are you able to heal that?"

traits.locale_text: "Biçimsiz Sektör'de bir yaratıkla karşılaştım. Kurbanlarının yaşamlarından yıllar çalıp, bedenlerini mutasyona uğratabiliyordu. Böyle bir şeyi iyileştirebilir misin?"
